specific_achievements: Professional abstract artist with major brand collaborations including Michaels, Crayola, Texas Rangers
short_bio: Abstract artist who creates joyful, colorful paintings. Also advocates for Down syndrome awareness after being diagnosed with DSRD at 16.
key_accomplishments: 132K+ Instagram followers, featured in Texas Monthly, Creative Boom, collaborated with Michaels, Tate, Crayola
awards_&_honors: Featured artist at multiple galleries in US, UK, and Mexico

specific_achievements: Co-founder of John's Crazy Socks, world's largest sock store
short_bio: Co-founder and Chief Happiness Officer of John's Crazy Socks. First entrepreneur with Down syndrome to win EY Entrepreneur of the Year Award.
notable_quotes: I have Down syndrome, but Down syndrome never holds me back.
key_accomplishments: 2M+ orders fulfilled, $800K+ donated to charity, testified twice before US Congress, spoke at United Nations
awards_&_honors: EY Entrepreneur of the Year 2019 NY, Henry Viscardi Achievement Award 2022, NDSS Board Member

specific_achievements: CEO of 21 Pineapples Shirt Co, 100+ Special Olympics medals
short_bio: CEO of 21 Pineapples, a Hawaiian shirt company promoting awareness for Down syndrome. Also a model and 100+ time Special Olympics gold medalist.
notable_quotes: Be a Good Human. The way I want to change the world is through love.
key_accomplishments: $1M+ in sales first 6 months, modeled at LA Fashion Week, performed at Grand Ole Opry
awards_&_honors: Featured on Fox and Friends, WGN News

specific_achievements: CEO of Collettey's Cookies, $1.2M+ lifetime revenue
short_bio: Founder and CEO of Collettey's Cookies, employing people with disabilities. Author of children's books and runs leadership workshops.
notable_quotes: No matter who you are, you can make a great difference in this world.
key_accomplishments: 400K+ cookies sold, 15+ employees (half with disabilities), featured on CNN, GMA, CBS, ABC
awards_&_honors: Star Ambassador for Massachusetts Down Syndrome Congress at UN 2018

specific_achievements: First person with Down syndrome in US to own a restaurant
short_bio: Former owner of Tim's Place restaurant in Albuquerque, known for serving 'breakfast, lunch, and hugs.' Now motivational speaker and advocate.
notable_quotes: If you can dream it, you can do it! We are a gift to the world.
key_accomplishments: Hugged President Obama at White House, 32,000+ hugs served, keynote speaker for dozens of organizations
directory_categories: Entrepreneurs & Business Owners, Public Speakers & Advocates

specific_achievements: Star of The Peanut Butter Falcon, first actor with Down syndrome to present at the Oscars
short_bio: Breakthrough actor who starred in The Peanut Butter Falcon, the highest-grossing independent film of 2019. Made history presenting at the Academy Awards.
key_accomplishments: Star of The Peanut Butter Falcon (2019), first Oscar presenter with Down syndrome (2020)
awards_&_honors: Gotham Independent Film Award for Breakthrough Actor (nominated)

specific_achievements: Actress in American Horror Story, first woman with Down syndrome to walk at NYFW
short_bio: Actress best known for her roles in American Horror Story. First woman with Down syndrome to walk the runway at New York Fashion Week.
key_accomplishments: Starred in American Horror Story (multiple seasons), NYFW runway 2015, advocacy work with NDSC and AAPD

specific_achievements: Actress best known as Becky Jackson on Glee
short_bio: Actress known for playing Becky Jackson on the hit TV show Glee. Advocate for disability rights, worked with the Obama administration.
key_accomplishments: Glee regular cast member (2009-2015), appointed to President's Committee for People with Intellectual Disabilities
awards_&_honors: Worked with Obama administration on disability issues

specific_achievements: First actor with Down syndrome to star in a TV series (Life Goes On)
short_bio: Pioneer actor who broke barriers as Corky Thatcher on Life Goes On (1989-1993). Also a folk singer and advocate for NDSS.
key_accomplishments: Star of Life Goes On (ABC), NDSS Goodwill Ambassador, released albums
awards_&_honors: Emmy nomination consideration, Golden Globe nomination consideration

specific_achievements: First European with Down syndrome to earn a university degree
short_bio: Spanish actor and educator, first European with Down syndrome to earn a university degree. Won Silver Shell Award at San Sebastian Film Festival.
key_accomplishments: BA in Educational Psychology, Silver Shell Award for Best Actor (2009), starred in 'Yo También'
awards_&_honors: Silver Shell Award - San Sebastian Film Festival 2009

specific_achievements: Actress, talk show host, viral ad challenging stereotypes
short_bio: Canadian actress and influencer who went viral for challenging Down syndrome stereotypes. Stars in Champions (2023) and hosts The Madison Tevlin Show.
notable_quotes: I have Down syndrome and it's the least interesting thing about me.
key_accomplishments: 376K Instagram followers, starred in Champions, featured in viral Canadian Down syndrome ad

specific_achievements: First actor with Down syndrome to play Hamlet in a touring production
short_bio: British actor who made history as the first actor with Down syndrome to play Hamlet in a touring theatrical production.
key_accomplishments: First Hamlet with Down syndrome, starred in Line of Duty, Coming Down the Mountain

specific_achievements: Actress, model, author of 'You Are Enough' published by Scholastic
short_bio: Ukrainian-American actress, model, and author known for viral video 'Down Syndrome is Not Scary.' Author of Scholastic books.
key_accomplishments: Viral 'Down Syndrome is Not Scary' video, author of 'You Are Enough' and 'You Are Loved', acted in Switched at Birth

specific_achievements: Actress and model with extensive commercial and film credits
short_bio: Actress and model who has appeared in commercials for TJ Maxx, Prudential, P&G, and walked in Kornit LA Fashion Week.
notable_quotes: Everyone is unique, beautiful and brave.
key_accomplishments: Narrator for audiobook 'Different, A Great Thing to Be!', Summersalt campaign, multiple TV appearances

specific_achievements: First actor with Down syndrome to appear in Coronation Street
short_bio: British actor who made history as the first actor with Down syndrome to appear in Coronation Street, playing Alex Warner.
notable_quotes: Having Down's syndrome has never held me back and everyone should follow their dreams.
key_accomplishments: First actor with Down syndrome in Coronation Street, Mencap Ambassador

specific_achievements: World's first professional model with Down syndrome
short_bio: Australian model who became the world's first professional model with Down syndrome. Has walked at NYFW, Paris Fashion Week, and London Fashion Week.
key_accomplishments: 330K Instagram followers, walked 8 seasons NYFW, featured in Forbes as #1 game changer

specific_achievements: First model with Down syndrome to appear in Gucci campaign
short_bio: British model who made history as the first person with Down syndrome to appear in a Gucci campaign and on British Vogue.
key_accomplishments: Gucci Beauty campaign 2020, British Vogue cover, Radical Beauty Project

specific_achievements: 4x Special Olympics US National Gymnastics Champion and model
short_bio: Four-time Special Olympics US National Champion gymnast who has also modeled for Vogue and walked at New York Fashion Week.
key_accomplishments: 4x Special Olympics National Champion, featured in Vogue, NYFW model

specific_achievements: Model featured in Italian Vogue and Marie Claire Brazil

awards_&_honors: Hands Up for Downs Charity Ambassador

specific_achievements: First person with Down syndrome to complete an Ironman Triathlon
short_bio: Endurance athlete who made history as the first person with Down syndrome to complete a full Ironman triathlon (2020).
key_accomplishments: Completed Ironman Florida 2020 (16:46:09), ESPN ESPY consideration, motivational speaker
awards_&_honors: ESPY consideration, Jimmy V Foundation recognition

specific_achievements: First person with Down syndrome to swim English Channel relay and Lake Tahoe
short_bio: Swimmer, speaker, and advocate. First person with Down syndrome to swim English Channel relay and 9 miles across Lake Tahoe.
notable_quotes: Down syndrome is a life meant to be lived! And saved!
key_accomplishments: English Channel relay swim, 9-mile Lake Tahoe swim, first living person with DS to receive honorary doctorate
awards_&_honors: Honorary Doctorate, Quincy Jones Exceptional Advocacy Award

specific_achievements: World and European champion track and field athlete
short_bio: Turkish track and field athlete who has won World and European championships.
key_accomplishments: World Championship gold medals, European Championship gold medals

specific_achievements: Plays 7 instruments, first person with Down syndrome to perform at Carnegie Hall
short_bio: Accomplished musician who plays seven instruments and has performed in 40 states and 15 countries, including Carnegie Hall.
notable_quotes: Given opportunities, individuals with disabilities can 'Make It Happen!'
key_accomplishments: Carnegie Hall debut 2015, performed for Qatar Philharmonic, 3rd Dan Black Belt in Tae Kwon Do, Buffalo Music Hall of Fame 2022
awards_&_honors: Quincy Jones Exceptional Advocacy Award 2011, Presidents Awards from Singapore/Dubai/Trinidad, Buffalo Music Hall of Fame

specific_achievements: Emmy-winning Born This Way cast member
short_bio: Cast member of Emmy-winning A&E series Born This Way. Works at an insurance company and is known for her positive energy.

specific_achievements: Emmy-winning Born This Way cast, rapper and musician

specific_achievements: Emmy-winning Born This Way cast, has Mosaic Down syndrome
short_bio: Cast member of Emmy-winning Born This Way. Has rare Mosaic Down syndrome form.

short_bio: Cast member of Born This Way who married fellow cast member Angel Callahan on the show. Works as school employee.

specific_achievements: NYT bestselling author, founder of The Lucky Few Foundation, mother of two children with Down syndrome
short_bio: New York Times bestselling author and founder of The Lucky Few, advocating for Down syndrome inclusion. Mother of two adopted children with DS.
key_accomplishments: NYT bestselling author, 500K+ social followers, The Lucky Few podcast, founded viral tattoo movement

specific_achievements: Global Messenger for Special Olympics, powerful essays on Down syndrome

key_accomplishments: Special Olympics Global Messenger, testified before Congress, published essays

specific_achievements: First person with Down syndrome to hold public office in Spain

short_bio: First professional lobbyist with Down syndrome in Washington DC, host of 'Kayla's Korner' podcast.

short_bio: CEO of nonprofit Bluebird Beach Bungalows, raised over $80,000 for 60+ charities building birdhouses from reclaimed wood.
key_accomplishments: $80K+ raised, 60+ charities supported

specific_achievements: Diana Award recipient, model, actor in stage production of Allegiance
short_bio: Artist, model, fashion designer, actor currently in George Takei's play 'Allegiance.' Featured in People Magazine 3 times.
key_accomplishments: The Diana Award, People Magazine features, Allegiance cast

specific_achievements: Author of 'Know Me Before You Judge Me' in National Geographic Kids
short_bio: Writer famous for 'Know Me Before You Judge Me' in National Geographic Kids, poet whose poems were turned into songs.
key_accomplishments: National Geographic Kids feature, poems turned to songs by Rachel Fuller

short_bio: Chief Inspiration Officer of GiGi's Playhouse, the only international network of Down Syndrome Achievement Centers. First person with Down syndrome to co-host a video podcast.
First woman with Down syndrome to win a state USA pageant title. Miss Delaware Teen USA 2024 and first contestant with DS to compete at national Miss Teen USA pageant.
First person with Down syndrome elected to a regional parliament in Europe. Member of Corts Valencianes since 2023, representing the People's Party.
First American with Down syndrome to represent a major international skincare line (Obagi Clinical). Model, speaker, and creator of #TheGraceEffect anti-bullying presentation.
Welsh model signed with Zebedee talent agency, known for championing diversity in fashion. Featured in Italian Vogue and Brazil's Marie Claire.
Founder of COALPIT Welsh Cakes, marathon runner, and Special Olympics athlete. First Welsh person with Down syndrome to complete the London Marathon.
Award-winning British actor who starred in the lead role of Luke in the film 'My Feral Heart' (2016), beating Michael Fassbender and Eddie Redmayne for Best Actor at National Film Awards.
First person with Down syndrome elected to a senior political position in Ireland. Member of Fianna Fáil's National Executive (Ard Chomhairle) since 2022.
First person with Down syndrome elected to public office in France. Municipal councilor in charge of inclusion and happiness in Arras since 2020. Author of 'Triso et alors!'
Award-winning British actress known for Ralph & Katie (BBC), Call the Midwife, and Upstairs Downstairs. First woman with Down syndrome to receive an MBE and first to receive an honorary degree.
British TV actor known for playing Ralph Wilson in The A Word and its spin-off Ralph & Katie. First actor with Down syndrome in a lead role on BBC drama.
Young actress and model who appeared in The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes and national ad campaigns.
British artist whose painting was selected by the Prince and Princess of Wales to hang in Prince George's nursery. Represents artists with Down syndrome through Heart and Sold charity.
Self-advocate and public speaker recognized as a '40 Under 40' honoree. Teaches public speaking and self-advocacy workshops.
Self-advocate and author who developed a blueprint for independent living using the 26 letters of the alphabet. Featured in NDSC Self-Advocate Book Project.
Self-advocate who founded the NDSC Self-Advocate Book Project in 2002, creating a community service initiative that donates positive books about Down syndrome to libraries and schools.
Co-founder of 'Gabi's: Powered by Special Abilities', a business empowering individuals with intellectual and developmental disabilities to find employment and purpose.
Creator and host of 'In My Own Words' blog and interviewer, dedicated to sharing stories and experiences of people with Down syndrome worldwide since 2021.
College student and independent living advocate. Featured on GiGi's Playhouse 'A Little Something Extra' podcast as an inspiration for self-determination.
24-year-old country music enthusiast and speaker. Featured on GiGi's Playhouse 'A Little Something Extra' podcast alongside his sister Annika.
Young woman and inspiring speaker featured on GiGi's Playhouse 'A Little Something Extra' podcast at 2025 NDSC Conference.
Self-advocate who presents on self-determination through the VDOE I'm Determined framework, sharing perspectives on living with Down syndrome.
Co-founder and Vice President of Black Down Syndrome Association. Parent advocate and NDAC member working on diversity and inclusion in the DS community.
British actress who plays Emma in BBC's Ralph & Katie, working alongside Sarah Gordy and Leon Harrop.
First city councillor with Down syndrome in Spain (2013). Pioneer in political representation who paved the way for future elected officials with Down syndrome.
